description: From idiocrasy +‎ -cratic, as with other -crasy + -cratic adjectives (e.g., idiosyncratic).

adjectives.description: idiocratic (comparative more idiocratic, superlative most idiocratic)

description: From idiocracy +‎ -cratic, as with other -ocracy + -cratic adjectives (e.g., plutocratic, kleptocratic, autocratic).

adjectives.description: idiocratic (comparative more idiocratic, superlative most idiocratic)

entries.meaning: Pertaining to, or characterized by, idiocracy.
